ResearchProjectDef.label: ENIAC
ResearchProjectDef.description:
[Interstellar Industries Complex Nara Terminal] [ version="1.0"] [ encoding="utf-8" ] Loading....
[To user] Being able to build ENIAC and read this information means that you or your civilization already has the minimum requirements for the realization of the technology in the disc...
OS>:_

ResearchProjectDef.label: lathe
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build lathe for early-stage compoment and reinforced barrel making.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy artillery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using ENIAC to calculate the artillery ballistics table, unlock the design of heavy artilleries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using reinforced barrel to build AT and AA Guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Concrete
ResearchProjectDef.description: crush and smelt stony material to concrete.

ResearchProjectDef.label: chemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build Chemistry Table that can artificially synthesize compounds such as Neutroamine.
